description:
At Montagna Klein Camden L.L.P., in Norfolk, Virginia, our lawyers take a straightforward approach to their work: no boundaries. Our clients come to us at a time of great emotional and financial uncertainty, and you need to know that every legal avenue will be explored on your behalf. We represent people who:

  • Have been injured in an accident that was not their fault — If more than one individual or corporation is responsible for your personal injury, we will seek compensation from all of them. Similarly, if you are entitled to more than one type of benefit (workers' compensation, Social Security benefits, disability insurance), we will make sure you get everything you're entitled to — during the legal process and in the future.
  • Have been charged with a criminal offense — We are located near the Norfolk courthouse and provide dedicated and aggressive defense for a wide range of traffic offenses, including DUI and reckless driving. We have also successfully defended countless clients on charges relating to robbery, burglary, theft, domestic assault, battery, as well as the most serious offenses of rape, murder and drug possession.
  • Are divorcing or are facing a child custody or child support dispute — The end of a marriage is a naturally stressful time. At Montagna Klein Camden L.L.P., we provide clear, practical advice and offer full support at a difficult time.

Call our law firm to schedule a free consultation. We will zealously guard your legal interests. With offices in Norfolk, Newport News and a large client base in Virginia Beach we have the presence and manpower that's needed to develop the right strategy quickly and get the best results for you. We accept credit cards.
